categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Marxa was a male Human who worked as an agent in the employ of Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was stationed at the Intelligence center aboard Vaiken Spacedock.
Agent Marxa appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a trainer for the Imperial Agent class on Vaiken Spacedock.
